medical_history.chief_complaint: Impaired energy metabolism and abnormal muscle histology.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented in the neonatal period with metabolic acidosis and unconsciousness. Symptoms including periodic weariness, indisposition, and lethargy began around age 21 and worsened with dynamic muscle work, leading to headache, nausea, and sometimes vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: B12-responsive methylmalonic aciduria, metabolic acidosis in the neonatal period.
medical_history.social_history: The patient had difficulties working as a graphic designer. Regular carnitine therapy was utilized between ages 21 to 26, followed by irregular supplementation.
